mapper.sql: `${tableName}`.`id` AS `${colPrefix}id`, `${tableName}`.`order_id` AS `${colPrefix}order_id`, `${tableName}`.`pay_order_id` AS `${colPrefix}pay_order_id`, `${tableName}`.`order_price` AS `${colPrefix}order_price`, `${tableName}`.`channel_fee` AS `${colPrefix}channel_fee`, `${tableName}`.`shop_incomes` AS `${colPrefix}shop_incomes`, `${tableName}`.`shop_channel_fee` AS `${colPrefix}shop_channel_fee`, `${tableName}`.`service_provider_incomes` AS `${colPrefix}service_provider_incomes`, `${tableName}`.`service_provider_channel_fee` AS `${colPrefix}service_provider_channel_fee`, `${tableName}`.`platform_incomes` AS `${colPrefix}platform_incomes`, `${tableName}`.`platform_channel_fee` AS `${colPrefix}platform_channel_fee`, `${tableName}`.`settle_date` AS `${colPrefix}settle_date`, `${tableName}`.`service_provider_id` AS `${colPrefix}service_provider_id`, `${tableName}`.`service_provider_id` AS `${colPrefix}service_provider_id`, `${tableName}`.`create_time` AS `${colPrefix}create_time`

`${tableName}`.`id` AS `${colPrefix}id`, `${tableName}`.`settle_date` AS `${colPrefix}settle_date`, `${tableName}`.`order_price` AS `${colPrefix}order_price`, `${tableName}`.`channel_fee` AS `${colPrefix}channel_fee`, `${tableName}`.`shop_incomes` AS `${colPrefix}shop_incomes`, `${tableName}`.`shop_channel_fee` AS `${colPrefix}shop_channel_fee`, `${tableName}`.`service_provider_incomes` AS `${colPrefix}service_provider_incomes`, `${tableName}`.`service_provider_channel_fee` AS `${colPrefix}service_provider_channel_fee`, `${tableName}`.`platform_incomes` AS `${colPrefix}platform_incomes`, `${tableName}`.`platform_channel_fee` AS `${colPrefix}platform_channel_fee`, `${tableName}`.`service_provider_id` AS `${colPrefix}service_provider_id`, `${tableName}`.`status` AS `${colPrefix}status`, `${tableName}`.`create_time` AS `${colPrefix}create_time`, `${tableName}`.`modifier_id` AS `${colPrefix}modifier_id`, `${tableName}`.`modify_time` AS `${colPrefix}modify_time`

`${tableName}`.`id` AS `${colPrefix}id`, `${tableName}`.`settle_date` AS `${colPrefix}settle_date`, `${tableName}`.`order_price` AS `${colPrefix}order_price`, `${tableName}`.`channel_fee` AS `${colPrefix}channel_fee`, `${tableName}`.`shop_incomes` AS `${colPrefix}shop_incomes`, `${tableName}`.`shop_channel_fee` AS `${colPrefix}shop_channel_fee`, `${tableName}`.`service_provider_incomes` AS `${colPrefix}service_provider_incomes`, `${tableName}`.`service_provider_channel_fee` AS `${colPrefix}service_provider_channel_fee`, `${tableName}`.`platform_incomes` AS `${colPrefix}platform_incomes`, `${tableName}`.`platform_channel_fee` AS `${colPrefix}platform_channel_fee`, `${tableName}`.`status` AS `${colPrefix}status`, `${tableName}`.`create_time` AS `${colPrefix}create_time`, `${tableName}`.`modifier_id` AS `${colPrefix}modifier_id`, `${tableName}`.`modify_time` AS `${colPrefix}modify_time`
mapper.select:
SELECT
,
,
,
FROM t_service_provider_settle_detail AS tssd JOIN t_order AS `to` ON tssd.order_id = `to`.id JOIN t_pay_order AS tpo ON tssd.pay_order_id = tpo.id JOIN t_service_provider AS tsp ON tssd.service_provider_id = tsp.id
ORDER BY tssd.create_time DESC, tssd.id DESC LIMIT #{startIndex,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_service_provider_settle_detail AS tssd
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_service_provider_settle_date( `settle_date`, `order_price`, `channel_fee`, `shop_incomes`, `shop_channel_fee`, `service_provider_incomes`, `service_provider_channel_fee`, `platform_incomes`, `platform_channel_fee`, `service_provider_id`, `status` ) VALUES ( #{settleDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{orderPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{channelFee,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{shopIncomes,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{shopChannelFee,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{serviceProviderIncomes,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{serviceProviderChannelFee,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{platformIncomes,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{platformChannelFee,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{serviceProviderId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{status,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE order_price = order_price + VALUES(order_price), channel_fee = channel_fee + VALUES(channel_fee), shop_incomes = shop_incomes + VALUES(shop_incomes), shop_channel_fee = shop_channel_fee + VALUES(shop_channel_fee), service_provider_incomes = service_provider_incomes + VALUES(service_provider_incomes), service_provider_channel_fee = service_provider_channel_fee + VALUES(service_provider_channel_fee), platform_incomes = platform_incomes + VALUES(platform_incomes), platform_channel_fee = platform_channel_fee + VALUES(platform_channel_fee)
mapper.select:
SELECT
,
,
FROM t_service_provider_settle_date AS tssd JOIN t_shop AS ts ON tssd.service_provider_id = ts.id JOIN t_service_provider AS tsp ON tssd.service_provider_id = tsp.id
ORDER BY tssd.create_time DESC, tssd.id DESC LIMIT #{startIndex,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_service_provider_settle_date AS tssd
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_service_provider_settle_date_summary( `settle_date`, `order_price`, `channel_fee`, `shop_incomes`, `shop_channel_fee`, `service_provider_incomes`, `service_provider_channel_fee`, `platform_incomes`, `platform_channel_fee`, `status` ) VALUES ( #{settleDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{orderPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{channelFee,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{shopIncomes,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{shopChannelFee,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{serviceProviderIncomes,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{serviceProviderChannelFee,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{platformIncomes,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{platformChannelFee,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{status,jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE order_price = order_price + VALUES(order_price), channel_fee = channel_fee + VALUES(channel_fee), shop_incomes = shop_incomes + VALUES(shop_incomes), shop_channel_fee = shop_channel_fee + VALUES(shop_channel_fee), service_provider_incomes = service_provider_incomes + VALUES(service_provider_incomes), service_provider_channel_fee = service_provider_channel_fee + VALUES(service_provider_channel_fee), platform_incomes = platform_incomes + VALUES(platform_incomes), platform_channel_fee = platform_channel_fee + VALUES(platform_channel_fee)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_service_provider_settle_date_summary AS tssds
SELECT count(1) FROM t_service_provider_settle_date WHERE settle_date = #{value,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND status = 0
